title: Data Transport Type
description: Transport mechanisms for delivering exposure data to measurement agents

enumDescriptions.snowflake_share: Snowflake data share for zero-copy data access
enumDescriptions.cloud_bucket: Cloud storage bucket (S3, GCS, or Azure Blob Storage)
enumDescriptions.direct_api: Direct API endpoint for real-time or batch data delivery
enumDescriptions.polling: Agent-hosted endpoint for orchestrator to poll for data
enumDescriptions.provider_managed: Measurement agent connects to ad platforms directly via its own integrations
